attributes.action: Demand the removal of Lindsay Hoyle as the Speaker of the HOC
attributes.additional_details: Parliament is losing trust from all sides of the Political spectrum, even the Main stream press have noticed that complete and absolute lies are being said to gain political gain. Those MP's should be held to account immediately and 'named' by the Speaker.
attributes.background: Have a vote of no confidence in Lindsay Harvey Hoyle as the current holder of the House

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked or for them to resign.
